info.title: Country
info.description:
An area of land that usually has an own government and
official borders. Provides the unique identifier, name, and
currency for a country.

x-sap-shortText:
An area of land that usually has an own government and
official borders. Provides the unique identifier, name, and
currency for a country.

tags.name: Country
tags.description:
An area of land that usually has an own government and
official borders. Provides the unique identifier, name, and
currency for a country.

sap.graph.Country.title: Country

displayId.description: The human-readable identifier that represents the country.

name.description:
Specifies if the name of the country is language dependent.
The name of the country is written differently in other
languages.

currency.description: The monetary exchange for a particular country.

sap.graph.Country.description:
An area of land that usually has an own government and
official borders. Provides the unique identifier, name, and
currency for a country.

innererror.description: The structure of this object is service-specific

post.description:
Group multiple requests into a single request payload, see [Batch Requests](http://docs.oasis-open.org/odata/odata/v4.01/odata-v4.01-part1-protocol.html#sec_BatchRequests).

*Please note that "Try it out" is not supported for this request.*

--request-separator
Content-Type: application/http
Content-Transfer-Encoding: binary

GET Bank HTTP/1.1
Accept: application/json


--request-separator--
